testimonal: Curiomind is one of the best online learning platforms I have ever come across. It has helped me learn at my own pace and played a great part in improving my grades. (Student testimonial)
name: Srijan Gupta

testimonal: Curiomind is a e-learning platform that has enabled me to upload entire courses in a very simple manner also conduct online examinations and quiz for all round learning. (Faculty testimonial)
name: Avinash Ranjan

testimonal: I have been using Curiomind for a while now, to help with my distance learning program. The courses are very easily accessible and fun to learn from this platform in a self-paced way. (Student)
name: Manidipa

testimonal: Curiomind enables teachers to upload weekly assignments and conduct online tests to make sure that students enjoy the holistic learning. I Would recommend this platform as 10/10. (Student)
name: Madiha Mallick

testimonal: For someone who has always struggled with online lectures and tests, Curiomind has been a game changer for me. It's easy navigation and controls have favoured my learning deeply. (Student)
name: Divya Kumari

testimonal: As a professor, imparting knowledge in a well rounded manner has been my goal. Curiomind has helped me design easily accessible courses where students get to access the material. (Faculty)
name: Ananya Chatterjee
